price: (16) When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwā,
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
